name: Return the Visa Ledger for a Visa Number

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1
When I search for a ledger with Visa Number 4966625660004688
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following visa ledger with balAvail=true,transAvail=true,limit=10000,bal=2363.33,balSign=,and transactions should be returned
| lineNumber | fullDate | narrative | amountvalue | amountsign |
| 0001 | 2015-12-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 73.09 | CR |
| 0002 | 2015-12-07 | PAYMENT THANK YOU | 20.00 | CR |
| 0003 | 2015-11-13 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 75.97 | CR |
| 0004 | 2015-10-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 78.32 | CR |
| 0005 | 2015-09-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 80.74 | CR |
| 0006 | 2015-08-14 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 83.24 | CR |
| 0007 | 2015-07-20 | PAYMENT THANK YOU | 20.00 | CR |
| 0008 | 2015-07-20 | PAYMENT THANK YOU | 60.00 | CR |
| 0009 | 2015-07-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 88.28 | CR |

title: Return the Visa Ledger for a Visa Number
